name: Safepay
headline: Digital payments for businesses in Pakistan
description: Safepay provides a single integrated payments solution that interoperates with local and international payment options. Our current focus is to serve businesses and individuals in Pakistan and neighboring economies.

founders.name: Ziyad Parekh, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder and CEO at Safepay. Software engineer by background. Double majored in Mathematics and Economics. Helped multiple startups launch and scale new product lines. Trying to achieve a similar goal with Safepay.

# Accept payments from
# Credit cards
# Debit cards
# Bank Accounts
# Mobile wallets
# Anywhere
Simple and easy payments for your customers
[Make a free account](https://getsafepay.pk/<https:/getsafepay.pk/sign-up>)
[or contact sales](https://getsafepay.pk/<#>)
# Backed by the best
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f2d8cefa1f1ec3622a82394/6107be8d5050cfb12a25540a_Y-Combinator.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f2d8cefa1f1ec3622a82394/6107be8d9d36a943f79ed1fa_Stripe.png)
![Illustration](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f2d8cefa1f1ec3622a82394/5f2d8cefa1f1ec273ca829f3_Group%20115.svg)

Digital payment options that help your business grow
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f2d8cefa1f1ec3622a82394/610b94899dda987edf70fd5d_chevron-arrow-down.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f2d8cefa1f1ec3622a82394/5f2d8cefa1f1ec3937a82c9a_right_Primary02.svg)
###### Hassle free
The best payment experience for your local and international customers
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f2d8cefa1f1ec3622a82394/5f2d8cefa1f1ec3937a82c9a_right_Primary02.svg)
###### Instant
Simple and transparent fund settlement
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f2d8cefa1f1ec3622a82394/5f2d8cefa1f1ec3937a82c9a_right_Primary02.svg)
###### Convert
Increase your revenue with high success rates
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f2d8cefa1f1ec3622a82394/5f2d8cefa1f1ec3937a82c9a_right_Primary02.svg)
###### Secure
Compliant with global payment industry security standards
Payments simplified
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f2d8cefa1f1ec3622a82394/610b94899dda987edf70fd5d_chevron-arrow-down.svg)
We remove the complexity behind accepting payments from websites and apps. From digital onboarding to detailed transaction reporting, our payment technology helps power your business to the next level
Powerful payment APIs
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f2d8cefa1f1ec3622a82394/610b94899dda987edf70fd5d_chevron-arrow-down.svg)
With the next generation of commerce in mind, we empower you to build custom payment experiences through our API. Designed with developers in mind, integrate in our sandbox in minutes
[Learn more](https://getsafepay.pk/</why-safepay>)

### Payment solutions built for every kind of business

# Control, manage and track your online payments
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f2d8cefa1f1ec3622a82394/5f2d8cefa1f1ec3937a82c9a_right_Primary02.svg)
###### Detailed information on each payment
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f2d8cefa1f1ec3622a82394/5f2d8cefa1f1ec3937a82c9a_right_Primary02.svg)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f2d8cefa1f1ec3622a82394/5f2d8cefa1f1ec3937a82c9a_right_Primary02.svg)
###### Access newly released functionality and features
[Learn more](https://getsafepay.pk/</features>)

generated_description:
### Safepay: Simplifying Digital Payments in Pakistan

Founded in 2019 and based in San Francisco, Safepay aims to revolutionize the digital payment landscape for businesses in Pakistan. As part of the Y Combinator Batch S20, the company has positioned itself as a vital player in the fintech space, focusing on integrated payment solutions that cater to both local and international markets.

#### Mission and Vision
Safepay is on a mission to streamline digital payments for businesses in Pakistan. The goal is to provide a single, cohesive payments solution that accommodates various payment options—from credit and debit cards to mobile wallets—and enhances the experience for both businesses and customers alike.

### Key Features
- **Integrated Payments Solutions:** Safepay offers a platform that allows businesses to accept payments seamlessly, making it easier for customers to transact from anywhere.
- **Developer-Friendly APIs:** With an emphasis on accessibility, Safepay provides powerful APIs to help businesses create their own customized payment experiences. This integration can occur swiftly within the developer's sandbox.
- **Comprehensive Payment Options:** Businesses can accept funds from various sources, including bank accounts, mobile wallets, and credit/debit cards, paving the way for greater flexibility and convenience.

### Product Offerings
Safepay's product suite includes features such as:
- **Checkout Solutions:** Tailored payment checkout systems for websites and applications.
- **Invoicing Tools:** Easy-to-use invoicing solutions that facilitate receipt of payments.
- **Subscription Services:** Solutions for recurring payments, ideal for subscription-based businesses.

### Team and Leadership
Currently, Safepay operates with a tight-knit team of four passionate individuals. Under the guidance of their group partner, Gustaf Alstromer, they continue to drive innovation within the fintech industry.

### Growth and Community Engagement
Safepay is backed by industry leaders, including Y Combinator and Stripe, affirming its ability to navigate the competitive landscape effectively. Its customer-centric approach ensures that all products focus on simplifying the payment process, making it a go-to solution for freelancers, entrepreneurs, and organizations of all sizes.

### Conclusion
As Safepay furthers its mission, its blend of technology and user experience positions it to not only reshape how businesses handle payments in Pakistan but also foster economic growth in the region. It's a company to watch as it continues to innovate and expand its reach. 

For more details, check out their website: [Safepay](https://getsafepay.pk/) or explore their offerings directly through products, invoicing, and more on their platform!
